listitem.para: initialised and randomises values for all the pieces' rotation and initialise other variables
to calculate which piece the minigame's selection pointer points to
detect when the player rotates a pice

simplesect.para: false - player has not completed minigame

listitem.para: update rotation for al the pieces
get status for minigame if it has started or not
